attributes.action: Get the Australian Authorities to prosecute ITV I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here Producers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is totally unacceptable that Gino D'Acampo and Stuart Manning are being court summoned for killing and eating a rat, which they were led to believe was wild, when they had permission as stated by George Hamilton, by the ITV Producers.  ITV should take all responsibility for allowing this to happen.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
